activities.name: Shanghai Museum
activities.description: Explore China's rich history through ancient Chinese art and artifacts. The Shanghai museum offers sighting of rare artifacts of the Chinese culture. Exhibits include Ancient Chinese Bronz, Sculpture, Jades, Numismatics, and many more.

activities.name: Guanfu Museum
activities.description: Discover traditional Chinese craftsmanship and antique furniture.

activities.name: Shanghai Foodie Tour
activities.description: Experience authentic local cuisine with guided tastings.

activities.name: Culinary Backstreets Tour
activities.description: Explore Shanghai's hidden food gems with expert guides.

activities.name: Shanghai Bund Cruise
activities.description: Enjoy a scenic evening cruise along the Huangpu River.

activities.name: Shanghai Tower Observation Deck
activities.description: Get panoramic views from China's tallest building.

activities.name: Yuyuan Garden
activities.description: Stroll through a classical Chinese garden in the heart of the city.

activities.name: Jade Buddha Temple
activities.description: Visit a serene Buddhist temple housing two jade Buddha statues.

activities.name: French Concession Walk
activities.description: Explore the charming tree-lined streets of Shanghai's historic district.

activities.name: Shanghai Disneyland
activities.description: Experience Disney magic with themed attractions and shows.

activities.name: Urban Planning Exhibition Center
activities.description: Learn about Shanghai's development through interactive exhibits.

activities.name: Propaganda Poster Art Centre
activities.description: View a unique collection of Chinese propaganda posters.

activities.name: Shanghai Circus World
activities.description: Enjoy a spectacular acrobatic performance showcasing Chinese culture.

activities.name: Shanghai Zoo
activities.description: Visit one of China's oldest zoos, home to diverse wildlife.
